NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Auditing and Growth or the cell corresponding to Consulting and Liquidity?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Banking and Liabilities or the cell corresponding to Banking and Liquidity?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Banking} and {Liabilities} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.40 to 0.48?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Tax, Liquidity), (Risk Management, Market Share), (Insurance, Profit), (Real Estate, Profit)}.
